titleStmt.title: An elegy on the death of the author of the Characters, &c. Of the ladies invention, who dyed on the 13th of this instant May at the Rose spunging-house in Woodstreet, under an arrest. / written by a Young Gentleman whom he had abus'd in his Characters.
titleStmt.author: Young Gentleman.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
First line: "He's dead! Lament ye mercuries and hawkers."
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
